title: Dragon Trainer LuLu Fan Art (Progress report!)
body:
Decided to try and draw League champions for the first time, Decided Lulu would be a good idea since Idk how to draw anatomy that good currently.
Wanted to get some feedback on my progress so far so let me know what yous think~ 
Should hopefully finish her in the next few days but I will keep this updated! 

Program used to draw: Paint Tool Sai
Tablet: Wacom Bamboo Pen and Touch - CTH-470

Please do not steal ;-; <3 ily xox

OCE: KorriPocky / SweatyNerd (Changed my summoner name)
NA: Nyahhh

Idk how to insert picture pls don't hurt me for being a bik noob :3

replies.body: Don't mean to be a critic, but the proportions are off a bit, you could try to make {{champion:117}}  appear a bit less 2 dimensional.
I did mention that I'm not good with anatomy as to why the proportions are off to an extent, But from looking at it I feel like It's okay for a first time League drawing.

Wow, that looks really nice! Although maybe you can add the crown/crest on her head a little bit higher. It looks a bit squashed, but that's just my opinion!

I look forward to seeing the finished project :D{{champion:117}}
I understand where your coming from but I like how i've done it so far, Might change it a tad in the end but at the moment I'm pretty happy with how it's looking :3
